tool_description: #1 Love Quotes with images API that you can use on your app or download and share.
title: Love Quotes by LoveMelon

api_list.name: getLoveQuotes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://love-quotes-by-lovemelon.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "love-quotes-by-lovemelon.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
